issue.title: Compiling a connection table file silently fails if the h5 file to be overwritten is open in HDFview

content.raw:
Fixed bug in exception handling of connection table compilation code.

When compiling a new connection table, an OSError is raised if the file is open in another process. In this case we had not updated the exception handling code to use the new OutputBox protocol used by the zprocess module. This is now fixed.
fixes #1
bumped patch version to 1.0.5

→ <<cset f5da60e98038>>

Fixed bug in exception handling of connection table compilation code.

When compiling a new connection table, an OSError is raised if the file is open in another process. In this case we had not updated the exception handling code to use the new OutputBox protocol used by the zprocess module. This is now fixed. fixes #1 bumped patch version to 1.0.5
